TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FileIOPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class FileIOPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 执行安全操作。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用绝对路径指定文件和目录。Files and directories are specified using absolute paths. 当访问文件，创建或打开文件时执行安全检查。When accessing files, a security check is performed when the file is created or opened. 除非关闭并重新打开该文件的安全检查不再次执行。The security check is not done again unless the file is closed and reopened. 检查权限时首次访问该文件可尽量减小对应用程序性能的安全检查的影响，因为打开的文件只发生一次，而读取和写入可发生多次。Checking permissions when the file is first accessed minimizes the impact of the security check on application performance because opening a file happens only once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times. 允许声明的范围取决于使用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 通过安全特性声明的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中存储和在运行时访问系统。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全属性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 对于命令性安全，使用相应的权限类。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class. > [!CAUTION] > `Unrestricted` 授予在文件系统，包括多个可用来访问某一特定文件的路径名中的所有路径的权限。`Unrestricted` grants permission for all paths within a file system, including multiple pathnames that can be used to access a single given file. 到访问到文件中，你必须`Deny`文件的所有可能路径。To access to a file, you must `Deny` all possible paths to the file. 例如，如果\\\server\share 为映射到网络驱动器 X，`Deny`访问\\\server\share\file，你必须`Deny` \\\server\share\file X:\file，你可以使用的其他任何路径访问文件。For example, if \\\server\share is mapped to the network drive X, to `Deny` access to \\\server\share\file, you must `Deny` \\\server\share\file, X:\file and any other path that you can use to access the file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何请求使用类中，指出是向代码授予的唯一权限。The following code example demonstrates how to request by using the class, indicating the only permission that is to be granted to the code. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何要求调用代码具有不受限制。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted . 通常在托管库 (Dll) 来帮助防止潜在的有害代码的方法或类中提出的要求。You typically make demands in managed libraries (DLLs) to help protect methods or classes from potentially harmful code. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermissionAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的几个实例类来设置不同的文件 I/O 权限级别。The following code example creates several instances of the class to set varying levels of file I/O permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对字符串值所指定的文件或目录的完全访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets full access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.

value.span: 用于完全访问的文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory for full access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他属性指定的其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性，以授予对指定目录的完全访问权限。The following code example sets the property to grant full access to the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对所有文件的允许访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.

value.span: 值的按位组合，表示所有文件的权限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the permissions for all files.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置对在本地计算机和网络驱动器上的所有文件的允许访问权限。This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives. 个人值可以由使用按位`AND`操作。An individual value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对所有本地文件的允许访问权限。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.

value.span: 值的按位组合，它表示所有本地文件的权限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the permissions for all local files.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地文件是包含在本地计算机上的文件。Local files are files contained on the local computer. 通过网络驱动器不访问任何文件是本地文件。Any files that are not accessed through a network drive are local files. 个人值可以由使用按位`AND`操作。An individual value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.

span.span: Gets or sets append access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.

value.span: 用于追加访问的文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory for append access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他属性指定的其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性，以授予访问指定的目录中的文件。The following code example sets the property to grant access to files in the specified directory. member this.ChangeAccessControl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可在其中更改访问控制信息的文件或目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.

value.span: 可在其中更改访问控制信息的文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置的单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他特性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 访问控制列表 (ACL) 描述个人或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件和其属性上的特定操作的权限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 若要更改 ACL 的功能是重要的权限，以及应多加小心授予。The ability to change an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

span.span: Creates and returns a new .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绝不能由应用程序代码，应仅由安全系统中，调用此方法。This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code. 在编译时，属性将安全声明转换为元数据中序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 从权限，此方法返回对应于此属性创建元数据中的声明性安全数据。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

exception.span: 要保护访问安全的文件或目录的路径信息包含无效的字符或通配说明符。

span.span: The path information for a file or directory for which access is to be secured contains invalid characters or wildcard specifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PathDiscovery { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PathDiscovery : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置针对其授予路径发现权限的文件或目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the file or directory to which to grant path discovery.

value.span: 文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路径发现控制对自身的路径中的信息的访问。Path discovery controls access to the information in the path itself. 这可以保护路径中的敏感信息（如用户名）以及有关路径中显示的目录结构的信息。This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure revealed in the path. 此值不授予对路径所指代的文件或文件夹的访问权限。This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path. > [!NOTE] > 出于性能原因，应仅授予目录，而不授予文件。For performance reasons, should be granted only to directories, not to files. 例如，如 C:\test 和 C:\test 路径应授予权限\\，而不适用于文件，如 C:\test\example.txt。For example, permission should be granted to paths such as C:\test and C:\test\\, not to files such as C:\test\example.txt. 此属性设置为单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他属性指定的其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性，以授予访问指定的目录中的文件。The following code example sets the property to grant access to files in the specified directory. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CPP/fileiopermissionattribute.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/CS/fileiopermissionattribute.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute/VB/fileiopermissionattribute.vb#3)]

value.span: 可在其中查看访问控制信息的文件或目录的绝对路径。

span.span: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置的单个文件或目录的访问权限。This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory. 使用其他特性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 访问控制列表 (ACL) 描述个人或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件和其属性上的特定操作的权限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 能够查看 ACL 是重要的权限，并应被授予时要格外小心。The ability to view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置， ， ，和单个文件或目录的属性。This property sets the , , , and properties for a single file or directory. 使用其他特性来指定其他文件和目录。Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories. 都仅; 用于文件数据的访问权限它们不包括访问控件属性和。The access rights are for file data only; they do not include the access control properties and . > [!NOTE] > `get`访问器提供用于 C# 编译器兼容性。The `get` accessor is provided for C# compiler compatibility. C# 编译器需要特性属性为读/写。The C# compiler requires attribute properties to be read/write.
